ribopipe ¶

ribopipe: An assembly and analysis pipeline for sequencing data¶

ribopipe is toolkit designed for automating the assembly, quality control, and analysis of ribosome profiling and other single-end RNAseq datasets. It is intended to be easy to use for bench and computational biologists and is quick to use out of the box.

RiboPipe is developed by Jordan Berg @ University of Utah <http://www.utah.edu/>, along with other collaborators.

Tutorial¶

Video walkthrough coming soon! See the Quickstart <content/quickstart> guide for more information.
